TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class FontFamily : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontFamily extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class FontFamily Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class FontFamily sealed : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable

summary.span: 定義具有相似基本設計和特定樣式變化的字樣群組。

span.span: Defines a group of type faces having a similar basic design and certain variations in styles.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範中的所有字型家族屬性類別。The following code example shows all the font families in the property of the class. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 若要執行此範例中，將名為`listBox1`表單和呼叫`PopulateListBoxWithFonts`從表單的建構函式的方法。To run this example, add a named `listBox1` to a form and call the `PopulateListBoxWithFonts` method from the form's constructor. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放此 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: Gets the height, in font design units, of the em square for the specified style.
The height of the em square.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *Em 方形*是指字型的寬的字元，傳統的字母 M 所佔據的矩形的印刷樣式詞彙。*Em square* is a typography term that refers to the rectangle occupied by the font's widest letter, traditionally the letter M. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 取得字型家族的 em 方形高度。Gets the em square height for that font family. - 其 em 高度的值當做文字繪製到螢幕。Draws the value of the em height to the screen as text. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要表示非語言相關，您應該指定 0 代表`language`參數。To indicate language neutral, you should specify 0 for the `language` parameter. 如需的可用語言和參閲清單，請參閱 Winnt.h 標頭檔。For a listing of the available languages and sublanguages, see the Winnt.h header file. 如果您有[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]安裝，此標頭檔通常找相對於[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]安裝目錄 common7\tools \\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include。If you have [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] installed, this header file can typically be found relative to the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] installation directory at \\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 取得字型家族的名稱。Gets the name of the font family. - 當做文字繪製到螢幕的字型家族的名稱。Draws the name of the font family to the screen as text.
